abstract: Some experts say the debate about a Medtronic heart device would not exist if efforts to develop a national database of patients who get heart devices had received more support.
snippet: Some experts say the debate about a Medtronic heart device would not exist if efforts to develop a national database of patients who get heart devices had received more support.
lead_paragraph: Conflicting data this week about the failure rate of a critical and widely used Medtronic heart device has set off a debate among researchers who want to understand the discrepancies and the implications for patient care.

headline.main: Heart Device Dispute Renews Push for User Registry
headline.print_headline: Heart Device Dispute Renews Push for User Registry
